    • Uses of CouponSystemException in connectionPool

      Methods in connectionPool that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.closeAllConnection()
      in this method first the system will stop giving connections and wait for all the connections to come back and than close them all .
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      all the methods use connection that they get from this method .
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      user cannot create a new connection pool .

    • Uses of CouponSystemException in dao.db

      Methods in dao.db that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyDaoDb.addCompanyCoupon(long couponId, long companyId)
      this method get couponID and companyID, and add it to the join table as a new coupon of the company.
      void CustomerDaoDb.addCustomerCoupon(long couponId, long customerId)
      when a customer buy coupon it will be save in a table in the database for him to use .
      void CompanyDaoDb.create(Company company)
      the company will get the id from the tabel and not from the user so its will be unique
      void CouponDaoDb.create(Coupon coupon)
      every coupon get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the coupon.
      void CustomerDaoDb.create(Customer customer)
      every customer get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the customer.
      void CustomerDaoDb.customerCouponUpdate(long customerId, long couponId)
      from this method on this is additional methods all those 3 methods are handling the join tabels.
      java.util.Collection<Company> CompanyDaoDb.getAllCompanies()
      in this method the user can get all the existing companies in the system
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getAllCoupon()
      this method get all the coupons from the DB and returns them as a collection
      java.util.Collection<Customer> CustomerDaoDb.getAllCustomers()
      this method will give the user all the customers in the system
      Company CompanyDaoDb.getCompany(long id)
      This method gets an id and returns a company object from the DB.
      Coupon CouponDaoDb.getCoupon(long id)
      user can get a coupon by giving the id ( no user will give id in the system it will happened automatically in the facade (after logging in ).
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
      This method gets a "coupontype" variable from the user, and get all the coupons from the DB with the same type as chosen by the user, and returns them as a collection
      long CouponDaoDb.getCouponId(java.lang.String title)
      this is additional methods that help user restore the coupon id .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerDaoDb.getCoupons(long customerId)
      this method give the user all the coupons in the system .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDaoDb.getCoupons(long companyId)
      this method will give the user HashSet with all the company coupons .
      Customer CustomerDaoDb.getCustomer(long id)
      user give an id and get the customer as an object.
      void CustomerDaoDb.isCouponExistByTitle(long coupon_id, long customer_id)
      with this method we can check if a coupon title is already exist so every coupon will be unique .
      boolean CustomerDaoDb.logIn(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String password)
      in the logIn if there any result from the database its true because a customer returned from the table.
      boolean CompanyDaoDb.logIn(java.lang.String companyName, java.lang.String password)
      the logIn method will return true if we get a result it mean the query is true to get company from the database
      void CompanyDaoDb.remove(Company company)
      this method gets a company object, and remove it from the DB.
      void CouponDaoDb.remove(Coupon coupon)
      method to remove a coupon.
      void CustomerDaoDb.remove(Customer customer)
      removing customer from the system .
      void CompanyDaoDb.removeCompanyCoupons(long couponId)
      the method gets a coupoun-id and remove this coupon from the DB.
      void CustomerDaoDb.removeCustomerCoupons(long couponId)
      removing the coupons that the customer bought.
      long CompanyDaoDb.restorCompanyId(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String compPassword)
      this method can help users to restore id
      long CustomerDaoDb.restoreId(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      this will help customers get the customet_id if they lost it or something.
      void CompanyDaoDb.update(Company company)
      user cannot update the id
      void CouponDaoDb.update(Coupon coupon)
      user cannot update id
      void CustomerDaoDb.update(Customer customer)
      the update method can update only the name and the password.

      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a customer can purchase coupon after the checking that the customer didn't bought this coupon all-ready and if there coupons left and that the date isn't expired; the method will decrease the amount of coupon from the company balance after the customer purchase one
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(long id)
      When this method is used the company and all her coupons that clients bought from her will be erased .
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      When a coupon is being removed its removed from the customers purchased coupons and from the table of the company coupons
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      in this method the system removing a customer and all his coupons .
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company company)
      can update only the email and the password .
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a company can only update the expiration date and the price of the coupon.
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method can only update the customer password .
